# OpenAI LLMs.txt

OpenAI provides LLM-friendly documentation in a variety of formats, including
the subsets described below:

- [llms-models-pricing.txt](llms-models-pricing.txt) - model data and pricing from
  https://platform.openai.com/pricing and https://platform.openai.com/docs/models
- [llms-guides.txt](llms-guides.txt) - guide documentation from
  https://platform.openai.com/docs including model data and pricing
- [llms-api-reference.txt](llms-api-reference.txt) - API reference documentation
  from https://platform.openai.com/docs/api-reference in a simple text format
- [llms-full.txt](llms-full.txt) - combined guides and API reference documentation

## OpenAPI specification

The official OpenAPI specification for the OpenAI API is available here:

https://app.stainless.com/api/spec/documented/openai/openapi.documented.yml
